results.title: Metformin Shortens Prolonged QT Interval in Diabetic Mice by Inhibiting L-Type Calcium Current: A Possible Therapeutic Approach
results.text_hl: However, a lower dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduced APD but did not influence the @<m>DISEASE_Long_QT_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008133 @@@prolonged QTc@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang H, Wang C, Lu Y, Yan Y, Leng D, Tian S, Zheng D, Wang Z, Bai Y. Metformin Shortens Prolonged QT Interval in Diabetic Mice by Inhibiting L-Type Calcium Current: A Possible Therapeutic Approach Front Pharmacol. 2020;11():614. PMID: 32595491
citations.BibTeX: @article{32595491, title={Metformin Shortens Prolonged QT Interval in Diabetic Mice by Inhibiting L-Type Calcium Current: A Possible Therapeutic Approach}, author={Wang H and Wang C and Lu Y and Yan Y and Leng D and Tian S and Zheng D and Wang Z and Bai Y}, journal={Front Pharmacol}, volume={11}, pages={614}}

results.title: Use of metformin to prolong gestation in preterm pre-eclampsia: randomised, double blind, placebo controlled trial
results.text_hl: Given that 40% of @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ arm and 28% in the placebo arm delivered for this indication, it is possible that @<m>DISEASE_Long_QT_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008133 @@@prolongation of gestation@@@ among those taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ would have been greater had we continued expectant management beyond 34 weeks' gestation.

citations.NLM: Cluver CA, Hiscock R, Decloedt EH, Hall DR, Schell S, Mol BW, Brownfoot F, Kaitu'u-Lino TJ, Walker SP, Tong S. Use of metformin to prolong gestation in preterm pre-eclampsia: randomised, double blind, placebo controlled trial  BMJ. 2021 Sep 22;374():n2103. PMID: 34551918
